data.lyric:
[ti:Here We Go… Again (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd/Tyler, The Creator]
[al:Dawn FM (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Here We Go… Again (Explicit) - The Weeknd/Tyler, The Creator
[00:04.99]Lyrics by：Rex Kudo/Bruce Johnston/Brian Kennedy/Charlie Coffeen/Benny Bock/Christian Love/Abel Tesfaye/Tyler Okonma
[00:09.98]Composed by：Rex Kudo/Bruce Johnston/Brian Kennedy/Charlie Coffeen/Benny Bock/Christian Love/Abel Tesfaye/Tyler Okonma
[00:14.98]The Weeknd：
[00:15.63]Strike a pose with my kinfolk
[00:18.13]Front page of the billboards
[00:19.69]Suit and tie and cigar smokes
[00:21.69]
[00:22.71]Macallan shots 'til it burn throats
[00:25.22]
[00:26.31]We still celebrating Super Bowl
[00:29.91]Catalog looking legendary
[00:32.26]Ring froze like it's February
[00:33.80]XO that's a mercenary
[00:35.96]
[00:36.88]A quarter bill on an off-year
[00:39.16]Used to sing on lofts
[00:40.37]But now we cruising on a yacht we clear yeah
[00:44.96]Said you wanted your boyfriend jealous with a couple pics
[00:50.82]
[00:52.02]And you didn't expect to fall for me once you got this d**k
[00:58.04]The city dark city dangerous
[01:00.22]Your girlfriend's tryna pair you with somebody more famous
[01:03.97]But instead you ended up with someone so basic faceless
[01:08.51]Someone to take your pictures and frame it
[01:11.68]
[01:12.46]And my new girl she a movie star
[01:16.00]My new girl she a movie star
[01:18.45]I loved her right make her scream like Neve Campbell
[01:21.55]But when I make her laugh swear it cures my depressing thoughts
[01:26.18]
[01:26.69]'Cause baby girl she a movie star
[01:30.23]Baby girl she a movie star
[01:33.64]I told myself that I'd never fall
[01:36.46]
[01:37.72]But here we go again
[01:39.26]Oh
[01:44.98]Here we go again
[01:48.53]Life's a dream
[01:51.53]'Cause it's never what it seems
[01:54.81]But you'd rather love and lost with tears
[02:00.87]Than never love at all
[02:06.10]So here we go again
[02:07.94]Tyler, The Creator：
[02:08.37]Although this love is strong to me
[02:10.07]Some things can change go wrong with me
[02:11.90]We don't know how it's gonna be
[02:13.59]Forever is too long to me
[02:15.68]We don't need the government involved because we like to touch
[02:19.15]We don't need no d**n religion telling us that we in love
[02:22.61]But if we did crush down the road spending lawyer fees up
[02:26.32]Pen and pack gon' save my a*s if these feelings freeze up
[02:29.84]You gon' sign this prenup you gon' sign this prenup
[02:33.45]You gon' sign this prenup you gon' sign this prenup
[02:36.32]The Weeknd：
[02:36.72]Oh
[02:41.82]Here we go again
[02:45.39]Life's a dream
[02:48.41]'Cause it's never what it seems
[02:51.65]But you'd rather love and lost with tears
[02:57.78]Than never love at all
[03:03.06]So here we go again
[03:05.48]
[03:18.50]The number one station to free your soul
[03:23.03]Free your soul
[03:24.32]Dawn 103.5
data.trans:
[ti:Here We Go… Again (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd/Tyler, The Creator]
[al:Dawn FM (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.99]//
[00:09.98]//
[00:14.98]//
[00:15.63]与我的亲友一起摆个姿势
[00:18.13]登上公告牌的头版头条
[00:19.69]西装革履 抽着雪茄烟
[00:21.69]
[00:22.71]畅饮美酒 直到喉咙如灼烧般疼痛
[00:25.22]
[00:26.31]我们还在庆祝登上超级碗的演出舞台
[00:29.91]翻看目录 尽是传奇
[00:32.26]戴着钻石戒指 就像是寒冷的二月
[00:33.80]XO厂牌 这是努力赚钱的完美团队
[00:35.96]
[00:36.88]即使是不景气的年份 也赚到盆满钵满
[00:39.16]以前在阁楼上演出
[00:40.37]但现在我们开着游艇尽情驰骋 我们惬意自在
[00:44.96]你说你想跟我拍几张照片 让你的男友心生嫉妒
[00:50.82]
[00:52.02]你没想到你在与我纵享欢愉过后就会爱上我
[00:58.04]这座城市漆黑一片 危险重重
[01:00.22]你的女朋友想让你与名气更大的人来往
[01:03.97]然而你却跟一个无名小卒在一起
[01:08.51]那个人会给你拍照片 然后装进相框里
[01:11.68]
[01:12.46]我的新女友 她是个电影明星
[01:16.00]我的新女友 她是个电影明星
[01:18.45]我真心爱她 让她像Neve Campbell一样尽情呐喊
[01:21.55]但是当我逗她开心时 我发誓她的笑声能治愈我压抑的想法
[01:26.18]
[01:26.69]因为我的挚爱 她是个电影明星
[01:30.23]我的挚爱 她是个电影明星
[01:33.64]我告诉自己 我绝不会动心
[01:36.46]
[01:37.72]但我们再次重温旧梦
[01:39.26]//
[01:44.98]我们再次重温旧梦
[01:48.53]人生如梦
[01:51.53]因为生活从来不是表面看起来那样
[01:54.81]但你宁愿勇敢去爱 饱含泪水失去一切
[02:00.87]总好过从未品尝到爱的滋味
[02:06.10]所以我们再次重温旧梦
[02:07.94]//
[02:08.37]尽管这份爱对我来说无比强烈
[02:10.07]有些事可能会改变 与我一起误入歧途
[02:11.90]我们不知道未来会怎样
[02:13.59]对我来说 永远太过漫长
[02:15.68]我们不需要政府介入我的感情 因为我们喜欢亲密接触
[02:19.15]我们不需要什么宗教证明我们矢志不渝的爱
[02:22.61]但如果我们感情出现危机 将律师费花的一干二净
[02:26.32]如果这些感觉变得麻木 提前做好准备拯救我
[02:29.84]你需要签下这份婚前协议 你需要签下这份婚前协议
[02:33.45]你需要签下这份婚前协议 你需要签下这份婚前协议
[02:36.32]//
[02:36.72]//
[02:41.82]我们再次重温旧梦
[02:45.39]人生如梦
[02:48.41]因为生活从来不是表面看起来那样
[02:51.65]但你宁愿勇敢去爱 饱含泪水失去一切
[02:57.78]总好过从未品尝到爱的滋味
[03:03.06]所以我们再次重温旧梦
[03:05.48]
[03:18.50]让你的灵魂重获自由的一号电台
[03:23.03]让你的灵魂重获自由
[03:24.32]黎明电台的103.5频道
